name: The Root The Branch and The Lightning
name_original: The Root The Branch and The Lightning
description:
a little game about the root, the branch, and the lightning (?)

In this game, you’ll be playing as the tree try to survive a cold, hard night, and continuous lightning strikes.

Use your root manipulation ability to avoid the lightning strike hitting the precious branch or better try to outplay the lightning by luring the lightning to strike the highest branch! But beware the root and branch manipulation ability can be used in a limited amount. So plan your game.
